PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>

DELETE
	{	?dataset dcat:distribution ?dist .
		?dist a dcat:Distribution .
		?dist dcat:accessURL ?url }
INSERT
	{ 	?dataset dcat:distribution ?newdist .
		?dataset dcat:landingPage <http://opendata.meteo.be> .
		?newdist a dcat:Distribution .
		?newdist dcterms:language <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/language/ENG> .
		?newdist dcat:accessURL ?access }
WHERE
	{ 	?dataset dcat:distribution ?dist .
		?dist dcat:accessURL ?url 
		BIND ( IRI (
					CONCAT("http://data.gov.be/dist/meteo/", SHA1(STR(?dist)) )
				) as ?newdist )
		BIND ( IRI(?url) as ?access )
	}
